document.discussion_title: Safety groups aim to keep students safe on their way to school
document.topic_text: Safety groups aim to keep students safe on their way to school Posted: As students get ready to head back to school, local groups are getting ready for the most dangerous time for pedestrians, in what's already been a very deadly year for Clark County.
document.post: Safety groups aim to keep students safe on their way to school Posted: As students get ready to head back to school, local groups are getting ready for the most dangerous time for pedestrians, in what's already been a very deadly year for Clark County.
